name: get_hourly_forecast
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cloud_cast.
Tool description: Cloudcast is a simple and efficient API built with Node.js and Express, designed to provide real-time weather information for any city in the world. It is able to fetch and deliver current weather conditions including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and other vital meteorological data.
API description: Retrieves the hourly weather forecast for a specified city using the RapidAPI Cloud Cast service.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the hourly weather forecast.
